resources.string: Please fill in the fields properly.
Health is Wealth, take your medications at the
proper time as prescribed by the doctor.
You are yet to add any medication, \nClick the + (plus) button to add a medication
Enter the procedure for taking the medication below, as prescribed by the doctor e.g 2 X 2
Click the +1 icon when you take this medication, to increase your medication intake Count by 1.
